sn24.4:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.4:1.3: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’”ti?
sn24.4:2.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.4:2.2: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’ti.
sn24.4:2.6: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.4:2.7: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’ti.
sn24.4:3.4: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:3.5: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’”ti?
sn24.4:3.12: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:3.13: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’”ti?
sn24.4:3.15: “Yampidam dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anuvicaritam manasa tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn24.4:3.17: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:3.18: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’”ti?
sn24.4:4.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imesu ca thanesu kankha pahina hoti, dukkhepissa kankha pahina hoti …pe… dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadayapissa kankha pahina hoti—
sn24.4:4.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
